# timeat

Show local time at given location.

    
    $ timeat london
    London, UK: Fri Aug 22, 2014 04:44
    London, ON, Canada: Thu Aug 21, 2014 23:44
    London, KY, USA: Thu Aug 21, 2014 23:44
    London, OH 43140, USA: Thu Aug 21, 2014 23:44
    $
